p: Variants of ZIKV GFP were selected using a limiting dilution cloning method. Briefly, Vero cells seeded in 96-well plates (10,000 cells/well) were infected 5 days with ZIKV GFP at the multiplicity of infection (m.o.i) of l0 âˆ’4. Supernatants of GFP-positive cell monolayers were recovered, and the second round of virus cloning was performed on Vero cells, as described above. Viral clone MR766 GFP was selected and then passaged twice on Vero cells to produce a final virus stock for experiments. The infectious titer of the working MR766 GFP stock was 7.7 log PFU/mL on Vero cells.
